function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Job loss due to pandemic","Impact":"Financial instability, unemployment","Mitigation":"Support for businesses, government aid, job retraining programs","Technologies":"Remote work technology, online learning platforms","People":"Employees, small enterprise owners","Owner":"Government, business owners"},{"Description":"Economy hit by 3-6% GDP","Impact":"Financial instability, reduced economic activity","Mitigation":"Stimulus packages, international cooperation, trade agreements","Technologies":"Digital trade platforms, economic forecasting models","People":"Government officials, economists","Owner":"Government, international organizations"},{"Description":"Reduced mobility causing industries to shut down","Impact":"Business closures, job loss, supply chain disruptions","Mitigation":"Remote work policies, supply chain diversification, government support","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, supply chain management software","People":"Industry workers, supply chain managers","Owner":"Government, business owners"}]}
